title: Mohanayanangal
overview: A female doctor arrives in a village with her son and husband. The village men fantasy her and want to have their way with her. They pretend to be patients and visit her clinic just to see her. The doctor and her family is doing well but suddenly her son starts to behave weirdly. They soon come across a secret which leads them to the sudden change of behavior in their son, which is connected to his birth.
